Silk Oak (backyard), bougainvillea (front & back), African daisies (front), Irises (back garden), roses (front garden), fuchsia succulent pink flowers (back), many fruit trees (front). It's always nice to have at least one larger bedroom downstairs, and we have 2 of them, with high ceilings. The kitchen opens to a separate family room with a beautiful fireplace. The living room contains a long area for formal dining (at least 12) and an impressive floor to ceiling marble fireplace. Private enclosed drive. The street has virtually zero traffic as we are at the very top of the culdesac.

text: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Be king of the mountain and enjoy spectacular, unobstructed, panoramic south facing views of the city lights all the way from Newport Coast to the Palos Verdes Peninsula and out to Catalina Island! And, the views don't stop there. Out the back of the house the tranquil view is of the surrounding hills. To sum it up, there are stunning views out of every single window and from every single angle on the property. This extremely private, gated, nearly 2 acre site is located on one of the highest peaks in prestigious La Habra Heights, and offers a once in a lifetime opportunity for a homeowner to develop the multi million dollar estate of their dreams, or for an investor with a vision. Or... just enjoy the home as is. The main house is 1424 sq. ft., and has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, and a 2 car garage. The remodeled kitchen features an Imperial 6 burner stove with a griddle, broiler, a double oven and even a pot filler. The built-in refrigerator, wine fridge, wet bar, and a large office nook are extra perks. The dining room has French doors which open up to a cozy patio where you will want to sit to enjoy the beautiful sunsets and the Disneyland fireworks. Or, relax in the inviting, rustic looking family room which has stone floors, exposed wood beamed ceilings, a large brick fireplace, and huge windows with stunning views that seem endless. The second structure on the property is approximately 650 sq. ft. and consists of 1 expansive great room, 1 bedroom, a large entry area, and a bathroom - a perfect remote guest quarters/office/game room/studio option. Multiple patios surround the homes, and the property line extends across a private road where there is plenty of room for a pool, tennis court, horse stables or RV parking. Possibilities for expansion are endless, and are only limited by your imagination. I cannot state this strongly enough...the views from this property are absolutely breathtaking and you must see it in person to truly appreciate how magnificent it is!

text: This is an incredibly rare opportunity to develop the multi-million dollar estate of your dreams. This 1.58 acre rural view home is on the market for the first time in 50 years. There are no other properties like this one standing atop a ridge of hills separating Orange and Los Angeles Counties. It is a Prime location, zone ''Residential-Agriculture'' and is the only 1+ acre, mostly level or gentle sloped parcel anywhere in La Habra Heights with exquisite views of both the Pacific Ocean and San Gabriel mountains. The current structure could be renovated or use a portion of the building pad and extend the footprint considerably. Behind the home, the land slopes away gently with several large areas suitable for construction of sports courts, stables, riding arenas, etc. Existing improvements include 1714 sf Home, water, power, natural gas and septic system on a private paved road. High-speed T-1 Internet is available at the street. Recent termite inspection completed. Recently completed boundary survey including topographic contours mapping, the location of all improvements on the property including buildings and other structures, fences, utility lines, roads and the location of all access, utility and other easements recorded against the property. Paved RV parking pad for motorhomes or trailers up to 40 feet in length. The 1714 sf residence, built in 1955, shows its age and is sold AS-IS. It is the responsibility of the Buyer to verify zoning and permits with City/County for any renovations or additions.La Habra Heights is a rare rural oasis of peace and quiet amid wild flowers, black oaks and green wild grasses, surrounded by a community of spectacular homes. The waters of the Pacific and Huntington Beach, the urban business district of Los Angeles and the winter activities of Mt Baldy are all within a short drive. Centrally located in Southern California, this property sits near the western end of the hills stretching from Chino to Whittier and is a natural wildlife corridor. Yet, is close enough for commutes into downtown L.A. or Orange County beaches. Snow skiing at Wrightwoood is approximately an hour drive and Palm Springs is less than 2 hours away.

text: The romance of Alta California is alive and well at the John Arnholt Smith Hacienda designed by Cliff May in 1936. Here, straddling the boundaries and history of both Los Angeles, & Orange Counties, the estate maintains over 2.3 acres of the high ground of one of Southern California's early pastoral ranches. Hand crafted of masonry and heavy timbers like the California Missions themselves, the classic California walled courtyard design, with its wide shaded corridors, invites the casual hospitality and an indoor-outdoor living lifestyle celebrated since the days of the ranchos. While the early vistas of citrus and avocado are no longer, the unobstructed panoramic City lights views, stretching from the mountains to the sea, provide a dramatic backdrop to this now park-like estate featuring broad lawns, gardens, courtyard & patios, olive orchard, pool, aviary, and gated parking. The property was prominently featured in the U.C.S.B. Museum Cliff May retrospective: Carefree California
nearby_schools: Fullerton Joint Union High School District, Lowell Joint School District

Without a doubt, this rural and secluded community has become one of the most beautiful and desirable home site areas in Los Angeles County. Its natural beauty at the start provided an ideal setting for this, but great credit must go to those remarkably individualistic people who choose this area for their homes and developed and nurtured this community until it is unsurpassed in charm and beauty and home-like atmosphere.

Originally built in 1947 this charmer has been impeccably redesigned with open living spaces and plenty of room. Folding glass doors across the rear of the home highlight the rolling landscapes that define La Habra Heights living. A welcoming front porch invites you in through the wide dutch door and solid hardwood flooring is found throughout all the living spaces. Exquisite folding glass doors captivate the senses as you are immediately drawn to the crisp views of Hacienda Golf Club and beyond. Fresh new paint and recessed lighting plus a fabulous custom built wet bar with wine fridge and a charming white washed brick interior wall make the perfect accent to this grand entertainers space. The kitchen and nook offer direct access to the pool yard which includes an impeccable newly remodeled pool house kitchen with custom cabinetry, quartz counters a ebony tone single basin sink. Just steps away is a full bathroom also remodeled with an oversized shower featuring subway tile and frameless shower doors. Back inside the home and off of their own wing are 3 secondary bedrooms, two with their own on suite powder rooms. The on suite bathrooms have been completely remodeled with whitewashed brick accent walls, new cabinetry, raised sinks and granite counters. Basket weave marble flooring and subway tile to the shower are highlights of the hall bathroom. The third bedroom features dramatic solid wood ceiling and peaceful views. Steps below is the Master Suite with its direct access to a private outdoor oasis and interior amenities such as an immense walk in closet and wide windows that peer out to the very private grounds. Brick flooring to master bath with oversized polished black soaking tub, wonderful walk in shower with frameless doors, Black Marquina granite counters and top of the counter basins, plus new lighting and mirrors create the pampering sanctuary you'll grow to cherish. A large laundry room with plenty of folding space and storage, another room complete with closets and it's own heating and air offers endless possibilities. All of this plus a utility closet complete the tour of this outstanding home. Ample and easy parking, a 3 car garage, charming dutch doors to pool area and entry, amazing storage yard, new exterior paint, new Central Air and ducts, new vinyl fencing. Get ready to fall in love!
